name: The Last Savior (JustusPan)
description:
Note: Please maximize the game window if you want to play it in the browser directly. Its resolution has been set to 1920*1080. Please download  exe if you find web version is slow or cannot be loaded. Story

The kingdom was invaded by the Demon King and only the legendary crystal could protect the kingdom.  

One day two adventurers discover the location of the crystal, and the Demon King's army comes under siege at that moment.  

The crystal must be delivered to the kingdom!  

The Sorceress chants a teleportation spell, while the Warrior stands in the way of the Demon King's army, buying time for the Sorceress.

Controls & Play

- `W`,`S`,`A`,`D`: movement

- `J`,`K`,`L`: different stance and attack button of weapon, could be efficient for eliminating specific type of enemies.

- `J`: Attack with 1st Great Sword stance, Slash

- `K`: Attack with 2nd Great Sword stance, Thrust

- `L`: Attack with 3rd Great Sword stance, Strike  

- Items: Meat for HP healing, Power-potion for Attack buff 

- Enemies：Enemies' colors reveal their types.

Play Target

- Keep Alive

- Protect Crystal
